flags.description: Target customer IDs (comma-separated or repeated; example: 456,789)
flags.name: --target-customers

flags.description: Target trucker IDs (comma-separated or repeated; example: 555,666)
flags.name: --target-truckers

permissions: User must be authorized to update the template rate agreement (RateAgreementPolicy#update?) via RateAgreementsCopierPolicy#create?.
side_effects: Creates a rate agreements copier and associated rate agreement copier works for the target organizations; scheduled_at and broker are set from the template at creation.
validation_notes: --rate-agreement-template is required. Provide exactly one of --target-customers or --target-truckers (one required; both cannot be set). Target organizations must be all customers or all truckers, and all targets must be in the same branch as the template rate agreement.
